abstract: Montana man Brandon T Betterman is arguing in Supreme Court case that 14-month delay in his sentencing for 2012 bail-jumping conviction violated Sixth Amendment's guarantee of right to speedy trial.

headline.print_headline: Justices Greet a Speedy Trial Argument With Skepticism
headline.main: Supreme Court Skeptical on a Speedy Trial Argument

snippet: A Montana man’s lawyer argued that the 14 months he spent waiting to be sentenced on a bail-jumping conviction violated his Sixth Amendment rights.
lead_paragraph: A Montana man’s lawyer argued that the 14 months he spent waiting to be sentenced on a bail-jumping conviction violated his Sixth Amendment rights.
